tweets.author: ワイト
tweets.text:
▼Gogmazios Gimmick Guide

◼︎Countermeasures
・Water Bubble and Oil Mud Adaptation Lv.1
・Earthquake Resistance Small Lv.2
・Environmental Adaptation Lv.1
・Fire Resistance 20 or higher
・Fire attribute and Dragon attribute weapons

◼︎First Area First Half
・Damage from

thread_replies.author: tadashiZ
thread_replies.text:
It's easy to understand! Thank you!
When I'm in the middle of playing, I don't have time to check the explanation screen, right?

thread_replies.author: tsubumi（つぶみ）
thread_replies.text:
This event quest has insanely good efficiency for heavy armor spheres!!
The part where Lagia is weakened and then Reyus shows up is also 

#モンハンワイルズ #MHWilds

thread_replies.author: 皆で一緒にモンハンライフあっと
thread_replies.text:
【拡散希望】

②クエストを受けると強制オフラインになる
ですが、対策としてゲームのタイトル画面の
「Options」＞「GAME SETTING」タブ内にある「クロスプレイの設定」の項目をOFFにしてください。

これはクエスト受注の画面ではない点に注意が必要です。

thread_replies.author: ひなあられ【大剣大好き】
thread_replies.text:
OMEGA RESONANCE IS HERE AAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!!

The collab skill can be triggered tooooooooo!!!

thread_replies.text:

You can surprisingly fly in the sky together!!

thread_replies.author: Harukyst.gm
thread_replies.text:
Recommended One-Handed Sword Equipment for Gogmazios Countermeasures 
(English follows Japanese)

 Easy to assemble with Production Talisman!
 Fire Resistance 20 without skills or meals
 Can distribute buffs with Wide-Range!

Start using this build first and then adjust

thread_replies.author: JeyO/じぇいおー
thread_replies.text:
This is the Gogmazios counter equipment.
I was able to defeat it with this build!
It seems more stable to stack fire resistance, environmental adaptation, and for guard weapons, enhanced guard performance.

#MHWilds
